div.data-react-data-bundle:
{"notifications":[{"id":7604,"message":"March 17, 2020 - Fowler School District R4J has made the difficult decision to utilize remote learning and close all of our school buildings through April 3, 2020. 

Academic Plan - Remote Learning:
We realize that this decision changes plans for the spring semester. Additional information will be shared on March 23.

Breakfast & Lunch - FREE
Fowler Schools is developing a plan to provide free meals to students. Families will be able to pick up breakfasts and lunches each day 7:30 – 9:00am in the drop-off lane at Fowler High School starting on March 23.

Buildings and Extra-Curricular Activities - CLOSED & CANCELLED
ALL district buildings, including schools and administrative offices, will be closed to the public, effectively immediately thru April 3, 2020, now April 17 as of March 18.. ALL extra-curricular activities scheduled during the dates of closure are cancelled. . We will keep the ‘Activity Calendars’ updated at www.fowler.k12.co.us.","type":"overlay"},{"id":7653,"message":"March 18, 2020 - Governor Polis issued an Executive Order requiring all Colorado schools to cease in-person instruction through April 17. This extends our Building closure through April 17.","type":"overlay"},{"id":7707,"message":"March 23, 2020 - Grab-n-Go lunches for ALL students at NO CHARGE begin in the FHS Drop Off Lane, 7:30-9:00am, will continue each weekday.","type":"overlay"},{"id":7785,"message":"March 25 - Based on the the Governor's Stay at Home order tonight, Thursday's Building Access has been CANCELLED. If your student has VITAL items at school, please EMAIL Mr. Bates or Mr. Lotrich to make arrangements.

We are allowed, AND WILL CONTINUE to provide Breakfast & Lunch every weekday morning (7:30-9:00am) for ALL KIDS 18 years and younger!!!

Student packets and work from teachers may continue to be picked up at the Breakfast & Lunch pick-up, but we may NOT accept or collect any work from students. As it is completed, please keep it at home until further direction is provided.","type":"overlay"},{"id":7923,"message":"April 1, 2020 - The Governor extended the suspension of in-person instruction through April 30.

We will continue to provide Remote Learning and Grab-n-Go lunches as we have since March 23.

We will provide additional information as we know it.","type":"overlay"},{"id":8084,"message":"April 20, 2020 - Fowler School District R4J reluctantly extended remote learning and closure of all of our buildings through the end of the school year. The Governor is also extending the suspension of In-Person Instruction through the end of the school year. We will continue to provide Grab-n-Go lunches & breakfasts as we have since March 23. Information related to graduation, athletics, locker/cubbie clean-out, etc. will be announced at a future date.","type":"overlay"}]}

div.span: Welcome to Fowler School District - Home of the Grizzlies

div.div:
Welcome to Fowler School District's website. We are excited for this opportunity to communicate with the outside world to show what we have to offer students and parents. Please keep checking for changes to the site at the school and district level as we will be adding more and more information.
Fowler School District is committed to providing a quality education for our students, making them life long learners and positive leaders in the community.

a.title: Board of Education
a.div:
Starting January 1, 2014, the minutes of the Board meeting will be posted on this website. Minutes are posted after they have been approved by Board action. Minutes prior to January 1, 2014 are available for inspection during regular business hours in the superintendent's office.
The online policy manual is now operational. Most of the documents are in Microsoft Word. If you need this information in another format, please contact Mike Thomas at mike.thomas@fowler.k12.co.us or at 719-263-4224. The Board of Education will review these policies on a regular basis and make changes as needed.

p.span: Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, & Math = STEAM

div.p: Students will explore, through hands-on experiences, the world. Broken down by grade groups, (K-3rd, 4th through 6th, Junior High and High School) kids will be given guided projects such as bridge building, simple machines, kitchen chemistry, basic physics, digital designs, virtual reality, augmented reality, robotics, and even learning to fly a drone.
Due to all of the COVID-19 issues we will provide a few online options for students to try at home to continue their exploration into STEAM.

p.a: Math and Science games for Elementary & Junior High
p.br: This one will require an account and login, but has some cool stuff for kids.
This is a Physics/Engineering type game. No login required
Lets build a Rube Goldberg machine to catch that crazy mouse Jerry. No login needed.

div.p: Catapults, trebuchets, kinetic & potential energy coupled with trajectory, physics, logic & problem solving - Fowler STEAM kids duke it out in a ping pong battle for supremacy.

p.span: Fowler School District No. R4j provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
